name: Wakamoley Racing
description:
A new game about clowns and racing right here: Wakamoley Racing.

Select a character on the main menu screen and pick a course. Then start playing.

Wakamoley is a fun and friendly clown. He is full of surprises. He loves to race with his pals. Some of his pals are Gus, Cooper, Boomer, and Pritzel.

Come join Wakamoley on his fun racing action packed adventurer adventures! Wakamoley may be a clown but nothing says he can't love adventure too! Let him come with you on many fast fury racing adventures on your Windows PC.

Download his game now on Windows! Free of charge.

Join Wakamoley the racing and dancing clown on his furious need for super speed racing course adventures for Windows devices now!

Disclaimer: Wakalomey Racing is legally owned by The Wakamoley Team, Inc. If infringed on, fees can form.
